name: ai-system
description: AI System - Marine Vessel Tracking Platform

scripts.build: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); if(!fs.existsSync('public')) fs.mkdirSync('public'); const copyDir=(src,dest)=>{if(!fs.existsSync(dest)) fs.mkdirSync(dest,{recursive:true}); fs.readdirSync(src).forEach(file=>{const srcFile=path.join(src,file); const destFile=path.join(dest,file); if(fs.statSync(srcFile).isDirectory()) copyDir(srcFile,destFile); else fs.copyFileSync(srcFile,destFile);})}; copyDir('frontend','public');"
